name: 7MinutesOfSomething
description:
What really happens when we die? Though there is no definite answer to this, we do know that there remains 7 minutes of brain activity. Do we know what happens in those 7 minutes? "Something" does happen. My game demonstrates what it was like for a mob boss to experience those 7 minutes.
Note: All Bugs and Glitches reported have been fixed. Thanks for informing and sorry for the delay.
